resources.string: What kind of item is it?
don\'t know where to begin? start by uploading a photo!

click on the upload button at the top screen and start taking pictures of your clothing items. make sure these pictures are taken on a blank neutral background. choose what kind of clothing item it is and the season in which you normally wear it. now save!

after filling up your closet, explore the other features in this app. on the home screen, you can click on \"dress me\" and generate an outfit! navigate to your closet from the bottom menu where you can see all your saved items. from there, you can delete items, send them to the drawing board, or donate them!

in the drawing board, you can move around the clothing items you sent to create your own outfits. if you love the outfit, send it to your scrapbook. you can navigate to your scrapbook from the bottom menu!
lastly, don\'t forget to check out the donations tab! if you sent items from your closet to donations, you can view all of it!
